verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: welcomes] [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-PRP: to kick off a three - day state visit] .
U.S. President Donald Trump welcomes [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] to the White House on Monday to [V: kick] off [ARG1: a three - day state visit] .
